snippet: In his debut on the PGA Tour, Scott Langley thrived on a pure putting stroke for an eight-under-par 62 in the first round of the Sony Open.
abstract: Scott Langley takes first-round lead at Sony Open golf tournament in Honolulu.
lead_paragraph: In his debut on the PGA Tour, Scott Langley thrived on a pure putting stroke for an eight-under-par 62 in the first round of the Sony Open.
